version_description:
* Fixes crash on start-up for devices with more than 60 IAA apps installed

Previously 3.1.58

* IAA/Directwave module
* DirectWave, .dwp (monolithic presets) are now supported.
* Playlist clips now don't move until selected (no unwanted
Fixed Restore Purchases issue (thanks for your patience).

* IAA updates
* Clicks when project looping fixed
* Fixed clicks when rendering songs that inc. 16 Bit samples
* Bugfixes & stability improvements.

- IAA Generators not listed if not supported
- Note off in some cases was not sent to FL when used as IAA instrument
- Audiobus now opens FL automatically.
- Audiobus presets saving
- New SHOP tab "Restore" button to restore in-app purchases o

* Startup tutorial video audio stops when the tutorial video is started
* Bugfixes and stability improvements

* Startup tutorial video audio stops when the tutorial video is started
* Bugfixes and stability improvements

* DirectWave - .dwp monolithic format stereo Sample bug fixed
* .dwp system-import (email etc) .dwp placed into My Instruments
* Can now send projects to external locations after selecting them on the HOME page
* Audiobus improvements (more Apps

* 'Add automation track' now works with MOD and PITCH controls on the Keyboard
* TransistorBass portamento bug fix

* Fixes Save > Send to ... (mail and iCloud) bug
* Fix debug text showing when L/R recording inputs are selected

* Fix typos on SuperSaw interface :)
* Minor bugfixes

- Clips can be moved and or copied between tracks
- Automation tracks can be reassigned to defined destination & have quick-access parameter slider in the mixer.
- Export dialog now has "save", and "send to another destination" controls, no need

- DirectWave has new features (Loop, Reverse, Legato, Mono and ADSR)
- New file management system. Create folders (fold), cut, paste etc. Options available after selecting files (Select).
- Re-layout of selection/files operation controls (moved to t

Bug fixes 3.1.934

- Fixes iOS store crash
- Users .midi & .tmpl (drum templates) files can be loaded now
- .instr files are visible in the DirectWave list.

Previously 3.1.933

- DirectWave has new features (Loop, Reverse, Leg

* 100 new SuperSaw presets*
* Fixes crash at startup on some devices
* General bug fixes and stability improvements

Please tap 'HELP > Users & Support Forum' to report problems or make suggestions

* Bug fixes and stability improvements

NOTE: If you experience crashes please tap: 'HELP > Users & Support forums' and let the us know.

FL Studio Mobile 3.2

- Audio Tracks: Level, Pan, Pitch, Reverse controls on lower Playlist. Use more than one sample per track.
- Clips: Can now be combined and muted. New Preview option plays currently selected clip only.
- Audio Editor: Ed

- Fixed issue when in some cases a song loads with corrupted drum tracks.
- Fix to rendering audio: in HQ mode channels were reversed.
- Misc bug fixes and stability improvements

* Misc bug fixes and stability improvements

NOTE: Please help us to help you! In the App, tap 'Help > Users & Support Forums' to register FL Studio Mobile to your Image-Line account and gain access to the forum. You can then report bugs, ma

- Pitch & Time stretching with Tempo Sync for samples and loops
- Sync all samples (track header menu)
- Rendered songs/loops now contain embedded tempo data
- Stretching function in envelope, notes/drums editors (on selection)
- New demo
Fixes UI issues for iPhone XR, XS and XS Max

* Time signature support
* Beats per bar, steps per beat support
* Misc bug-fixes and stability improvements
* Time signature updates (improved time ruler display)
* Reduced installer size

FL Studio Mobile 3.2.54

- Drum Pads can now be mapped to different MIDI notes (See the manual > Touch controllers section)
- Fixed sample rate/pitch problems when connecting headphones on some systems
- Delete empty tracks detecting wrong

FLSM 3.2.56

- mono mic input was recorded as stereo sample (on one side)
- "Delete empty tracks" Recording channel turns into an Audio channel.

FLSM 3.2.54

- Drum Pads can now be mapped to different MIDI notes (See the manual >

* "Split mixer tracks" project export (Save) feature added.
* Exporting user data folders as a .zip archive now possible. Tap (Select) and choose the folder and [SHARE]. Available export locations should now show.
* Bugfixes.

* Hot-fix update for presets/midi/drum templates not saving to internal storage.

Previously in 3.2.60

* 'Split mixer tracks' project export (Save) feature added.

* Exporting user data folders as a .zip archive now possible. Once i

* Cloud backup (Google Drive & OneDrive)
* Cut groups for Drum Tracks (see Seq tab)
* Step repeat for Stepsequencer (see drag-up velocity, pan, pitch window)
* Sample stretch & Start for Drum Tracks (see Sample tab)

* Fixes crash when buying content

Previously...

* Cloud backup (Google Drive & OneDrive, more coming soon)
* Cut groups for Drum Tracks (see Seq tab)
* Step repeat for Stepsequencer (see drag-up velocity, pan, pitch window) <

Bugfix update

Google Cloud, IAA, Recording issues. Cloning channel misplaced clips.

Bug fixes and stability improvements
